text: Sir, I need you to keep your voice down. We've had complaints about the noise.
speaker: SPEAKER_00

text: What noise? We're just having a little get-together.
speaker: SPEAKER_01

text: It's past 11 PM, sir. The city's noise ordinance is in effect.
speaker: SPEAKER_00

text: Come on, officer. It's Friday night. Give us a break.
speaker: SPEAKER_01

text: I understand, but I've had multiple calls from your neighbors. They're trying to sleep.
speaker: SPEAKER_00

text: Fine, fine. We'll turn it down. But this is ridiculous.
speaker: SPEAKER_01

text: I appreciate your cooperation. Just keep it down for the rest of the night.
speaker: SPEAKER_00

text: If I get any more calls, I'll have to issue a citation. Please make sure everyone understands.
speaker: SPEAKER_00

text: Alright, we understand. We'll keep it quiet.
speaker: SPEAKER_01

text: Thank you, sir. Have a good night.
speaker: SPEAKER_00
